Body: Description: After updating the endpoint client to the latest version, the update failed, and some laptops are displaying a black screen after the user logs in.

What We've Learned Updated: 19.05
- After updating the endpoint client to the latest version, the update failed, and some laptops are displaying a black screen after the user logs in.
- asked for further details

Next Steps Updated: 19.05
- waiting on the customer to provide further details

What We've Learned Updated: 19.05
- After updating the endpoint client to the latest version, the update failed, and some laptops are displaying a black screen after the user logs in.
- asked for further details
- upgrade style: Some using EPP and some using  Intune.
- client version: 6.0.1.6 to 6.2.4.1
- Widows 11
- Till now 6 laptops
- First, the laptop got stuck, and after a restart and login, the screen turns black.
- need to check this internally to see how to proceed

Next Steps Updated: 19.05
- waiting on the customer to provide further details
- check this internally with Adi and T2

hi @Eduard Nut​ the customer is having black screens after upgrading to 6241. First, the laptop got stuck, and after a restart and login, the screen turns black. There is a recording attached on how this happens. I also asked the customer to install 6242 instead of the old client. Do you have any ideas on how to proceed?

@Botond Biro​ Please try with the contender agent for 5.9.4.3 and see if the black screen is still present. I believe Andre has it on your shift.

Is the black screen also a BSOD or just the screen turns off?

This should not be caused by EPP. I would also return to 6016 and see if it works after that.

Please let me know the outcome.
